name: Ideal Nightmare
description:
The dreams of the worshippers of an indescribable evil have been fulfilled, cloaked by the shadows survive the nightmare. Customize your arsenal to hunt the dark forces of hell sending them back from where they came from in a body bag. Escape the nightmare or be eternally locked in.

Ideal Nightmare is a tactical light/sound-based stealth game which features:



  • Customizable weapons to fit your playstyle

  • Featuring various locals in an alternative WW1 history, where London was taken over by blood cultists

  • Know if an enemy is nearby by the sound of their footsteps and breathing

  • Tension between lighting your way and not giving out your position
